title: Did Bodweiser announce a plan to end the Super Bowl commercials in 2021?
subtitle: The Beer Company has announced a "Holostic" advertising plan for 2021.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: As the epidemic continued in the first month of 2021, Budweiser manufacturer Anheuser-Busch announced that it would abandon Super Bowl announcements and allocate funding to awareness and education of COVID-19 vaccines instead.
